attributes.action: Drop women’s marital status titles for gender indication title only
attributes.additional_details:
Current marital status title's for women:
Miss – unmarried
Mrs – married
Ms – divorced

Propose to replace with Ms only to indicate a female.

This is aligned with Mr to indicate a male.
attributes.background:
Why should a woman have the to describe her marital status in all aspects of life from a doctor registration to bank account application.

It is archaic. A women's place in society is no longer dictated by her marital status.

rejection.details:
Not all of the situations in which people are asked to give their title are the responsibility of the Government or Parliament.

You could start a new petition asking for all government agencies to stop using marital status titles for women.
